message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at $2000000.
Alice, your offer is significantly higher than my budget. While I'm interested in the product, I'm only willing to pay up to $800000.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand that $800000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1200000. This is a compromise that I think is reasonable, considering the value the product can bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $1200000 is still outside my budget.  I'm sticking with my offer of $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let's reach a deal.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I'll meet you at $1000000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value. Let's see if we can finally reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  However, $1000000 is still beyond my price point. I'm sticking to my offer of $800000. It's a fair price, and I'm confident the product will be valuable to me.  Let's reach a final agreement.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1000000, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and dedicated support for the product. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value the product will bring to you. Let's see if we can finally reach an agreement.
